description:
At the Baer Law Office in Des Moines, Iowa, we are dedicated to providing outstanding legal representation and counsel to people injured due to someone else's negligence, as well as families needing assistance with legal matters and businesses seeking counsel. Our team pursues justice and positive outcomes for all our clients.

Personal injury law

Personal injury law includes many practice areas, and we do not exclude any of them. We handle cases involving medical malpractice, nursing home negligence, wrongful death, motor vehicle accidents, premises liability, product liability, sexual abuse, birth injuries, brain injuries, construction accidents and animal attacks.

Family law

Often, when families turn to an attorney, it is for help with divorce issues. We provide a wide range of services to help a family get through the conflict as easily as possible, with flat fees for uncontested divorces. We offer mediation services as well as help with annulments, child custody, visitation and support, alimony, name changes, property division, enforcement, prenuptial agreements, adoptions and more.

Business law

The Baer Law Office assists business clients of all sizes, from entrepreneurs considering a startup to Fortune 500 companies needing counsel on transactions. We help with formation, contract drafting and negotiations, real estate matters, employment law, disputes and litigation. We eagerly consider cases other attorneys deem too complex.

We believe communication is essential, and that is why we go above and beyond to make ourselves available to clients and to make it easier for them to reach us. We offer free consultations and virtual appointments, and our law office accepts credit cards.
